com.hp.jipp.pdl.pwg

Class PackBits

  • com.hp.jipp.pdl.pwg.PackBits

  • public class PackBits

    Encoder/Decoder for the PackBits algorithm described in the Wi-Fi Peer-to-Peer Services Print Technical Specification v1.1

    • Field Detail

      • Companion

        public static com.hp.jipp.pdl.pwg.PackBits.Companion Companion

    • Constructor Detail

      • PackBits

        public PackBits(int bytesPerPixel,
                int pixelsPerLine)

        Encoder/Decoder for the PackBits algorithm described in the Wi-Fi Peer-to-Peer Services Print Technical Specification v1.1

        Parameters:
        bytesPerPixel - Number of bytes per pixel (1 for grayscale, 3 for RGB)
        pixelsPerLine - Total number of pixels on each horizontal line

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        public void encode(@NotNull
                   java.io.InputStream inputPixels,
                   @NotNull
                   java.io.OutputStream outputBytes)

        Reads inputPixels until there are no more, writing encoded bytes to outputBytes

        See Also:
        inputPixels, outputBytes

      • decode

        public void decode(@NotNull
                   java.io.InputStream inputBytes,
                   @NotNull
                   java.io.OutputStream outputPixels,
                   int lines)

        Read PackBits-encoded inputBytes into pixels in the OutputStream until lines have been reached.

        See Also:
        inputBytes, lines
